entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Fredericton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:14 PM AST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -3.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fredericton Int'l Airport 1:00 PM AST Friday 10 February 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -3.2°C
Pressure: 100.2 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -4.4°C
Wind: NE 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday: Periods of freezing drizzle or drizzle. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of freezing drizzle or drizzle. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or freezing drizzle. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
